library(readxl)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)

# Set your ggplot theme

# Load your datasets

#Importing eGRID dataset
generators_1996_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID1996_plant.xls"), sheet = 'EGRDGEN96', skip = 3)
generators_1997_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID1997_plant.xls"), sheet = 'EGRDGEN97', skip = 3)
generators_1998_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID1998_plant.xls"), sheet = 'EGRDGEN98', skip = 3)
generators_1999_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID1999_plant.xls"), sheet = 'EGRDGEN99', skip = 3)
generators_2000_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2000_plant.xls"), sheet = 'EGRDGEN00', skip = 3)
generators_2004_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2004_plant.xls"), sheet = 'EGRDGEN04', skip = 3)
generators_2005_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2005_plant.xls"), sheet = 'GEN05', skip = 3)
generators_2007_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2007_plant.xls"), sheet = 'GEN07', skip = 3)
generators_2009_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2009_data.xls"), sheet = 'GEN09', skip = 3)
generators_2010_raw <- read_xls(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2010_Data.xls"), sheet = 'GEN10', skip = 3)
generators_2020_raw <- read_xlsx(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2020_Data_v2.xlsx"), sheet = 'GEN20', skip = 1)
generators_2021_raw <- read_xlsx(here("Data/Raw/eGRID2021_data.xlsx"), sheet = 'GEN21', skip = 1)

#Wrangling 1996 generator data
generators_1996_processed <- generators_1996_raw %>% 
  select(`PSTATABB
State abbreviation`,`ORISPL
DOE/EIA ORIS plant or facility code`,`FUELG1
Primary generator fuel`,`NAMEPCAP
Generator nameplate capacity (MW)`,`GENNTAN
Generator 1996 annual net generation (MWh)`) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  rename('PSTATABB' = `PSTATABB
State abbreviation`, 'ORIS' = `ORISPL
DOE/EIA ORIS plant or facility code`, 'FUELG1' = `FUELG1
Primary generator fuel`, 'NAMEPCAP' = `NAMEPCAP
Generator nameplate capacity (MW)`, 'GENNTAN' = `GENNTAN
Generator 1996 annual net generation (MWh)`) %>% 
  mutate(Year = 1996) %>% 
  group_by(PSTATABB) %>% 
  filter(!grepl('N/A', GENNTAN)) %>% 
  summarise(GENNTAN = sum(as.numeric(GENNTAN)))
